main event: Two star-shaped silver, green, and yellow objects were observed in the sky.
interesting points: The observation occurred on April 24, 1957, in Bedford, Indiana.,The sighting lasted for two hours.,The objects were seen at different azimuths and elevations.,The reporting officer believes it was probably an astronomical phenomenon.,There are no reports on file regarding this sighting.
sighted object: two star-shaped silver, green, and yellow objects
